metadata.title: CVE-2024-27069 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ovl:relax WARN_ON in ovl_verify_area() syzbot hit an assertion in copy up dataloop which looks like it is the result of a lower file whose size is beingchanged underneath overlayfs. This type of use case is documented to causeundefined behavior, so returning EIO error for the copy up makes sense, butit should not be causing a WARN_ON assertion.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
